query.name: get_some_business_objects
query.sql:
SELECT pbe.entry_id, entry_datetime, pbe.memorandum, pea.entry_amount as invoice_total, mymeta.meta_value as invoice_number, pea.account_id as customer_id, mymeta2.meta_value as due_date, mymeta3.meta_value as paid_status, mymeta4.meta_value as paid_in_full_date
FROM &pb_entries; as pbe
INNER JOIN &pb_entry_amounts; as pea ON (pea.entry_id = pbe.entry_id AND pea.entry_type_id = 'Debit')
INNER JOIN &pb_entry_metadata; as pem
ON (pem.entry_id=pbe.entry_id AND pem.meta_key='invoice_number')
LEFT JOIN &pb_entry_metadata; AS mymeta ON (mymeta.entry_id = pbe.entry_id AND mymeta.meta_key='invoice_number')
LEFT JOIN &pb_entry_metadata; AS mymeta2 ON (mymeta2.entry_id = pbe.entry_id AND mymeta2.meta_key='due_date')
LEFT JOIN &pb_entry_metadata; AS mymeta3 ON (mymeta3.entry_id = pbe.entry_id AND mymeta3.meta_key='paid_status')
LEFT JOIN &pb_entry_metadata; AS mymeta4 ON (mymeta4.entry_id = pbe.entry_id AND mymeta4.meta_key='paid_in_full_date')
WHERE pbe.entry_id!=0 AND pbe.memorandum!='PLACEHOLDER' AND pbe.entry_datetime >= ? AND pbe.entry_datetime <= ? AND pbe.entry_id LIKE ? AND pbe.status != 9 AND pbe.fiscal_period_id LIKE ? LIMIT ?,?
